jobsJson.text: Talent Acquisition/HR Partner, Financial Services Platform
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Talent Acquisition/HR Partner
At GO-JEK’s Financial Services Platform Team, we wake up thinking about better ways to expand access to savings, insurance, loans, and investments to all Indonesians.  We build financial products with partners and deploy at scale to our hundreds of thousands of GoFood merchants, 1 million+ GoRide/GoCar drivers, tens of millions of users.  We’re looking for talented new colleagues to join us on our mission of universal access to financial services. 

We are looking for a smart, passionate Talent Acquisition/HR Partner who will be responsible for proactively building our Bangkok Team with active participation in Talent Acquisition and HR Administrative tasks,  This person will work closely with our human resource business partner (HRBP) and finance team to build processes for recruiting and on-boarding and will be directly involved in execution.

Role Summary:
This person will have the opportunity to build a highly talented Tech Team, responsible for building Southeast Asia’s first Super App, as well as have a major impact on the society and growth of the GET Brand in the country.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Partner with regional recruitment leads and hiring managers to plan, build local pipeline of candidates, contribute towards strategy for hiring practices, and conduct market mapping
  • Leverage on internal network of engineers to recruit additional top engineering talent into GO-JEK
  • Take ownership of complete life cycle of recruitment in Bangkok
  • Go-to person for all shortlisted candidates for offer, contract signing, and completion of all necessary documentation to provide candidates with a seamless on-boarding experience.
  • Conduct on-boarding with new candidates in their first few weeks
  • Monitor budget planning for hiring needs by proactively working with Finance TeamCollaborate with HRBP Team to streamline hiring process and visa process for non-locals. Manage and resolve complex employee relations issues
  • This role will also be responsible for assisting candidates moving to Bangkok with administrative items
  • Maintain accurate employee records and prepare data for payroll calculation, Conduct effective, thorough and fair investigations.

• At least 4+ years of experience in recruitment/talent acquisition
  • Hands on experience in sourcing candidates through various social/professional network platforms apart from traditional sourcing methods
  • Strong stakeholder management skills
  • Clear and effective communication skills in English and Thai
  • Ability to navigate and take ownership in extremely ambiguous situations
